doc.p: Server resources enable you to interact with a server that hosts Couchbase Lite databases.
The following table lists the server resources:.

tr.td: Retrieves a list of tasks running on the server
Retrieves a list of all databases on the server
Starts or cancels a replication operation
Returns a generic response for compatibility purposes
Retrieves a list of identifiers of the databases on the server

doc.p: This request returns meta-information about the server.
This request does not have any required headers.
This request does not use query parameters.
This request does not use a message body.
This response uses only standard HTTP headers.
The response message body contains a JSON document with the following objects:
The following example requests information about the server running at http://localhost:59840/.

pre.code:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Server: CouchbaseLite 1.485 Transfer-Encoding: chunked Accept-Ranges: bytes Content-Type: application/json Cache-Control: must-revalidate Date: Fri, 06 Dec 2013 19:21:48 GMT
{ "couchdb" : "Welcome", "CouchbaseLite" : "Welcome", "version" : "1.485" }

doc.p: This request retrieves a list of all tasks running on the server.
This request does not have any required headers.
This request does not use query parameters.
This request does not use a message body.
This response uses only standard HTTP headers.
The response message body contains a JSON document with an array of active tasks. If there are no active tasks, an empty array is returned in the response.
This request retrieves a list of all databases on the server.
This request does not have any required headers.
This request does not use query parameters.
This request does not use a message body.
This response uses only standard HTTP headers.
The response message contains the following object:

tr.td: List of the names of the databases on the server

doc.p: The following example requests a list of databases on the server. The response lists the three databases on the server: beer-db, cookbook, and genealogy.

pre.code:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Server: CouchbaseLite 1.485 Transfer-Encoding: chunked Accept-Ranges: bytes Content-Type: application/json Cache-Control: must-revalidate Date: Mon, 09 Dec 2013 01:45:38 GMT
[ "_replicator", "beer-db", "cookbook", "genealogy" ]

doc.p: This request starts or cancels a replication operation.
This request does not have any required headers.
This request does not use query parameters.
The request message body is a JSON document that contains the following objects:

tr.td: Indicates whether to create the target database

doc.p: This response uses only standard HTTP headers.
The response message body is a JSON document that contains the following objects.

tr.td: Indicates whether the replication operation was successful

doc.p: The following example replicates the database named beer-db located at sync.couchbasecloud.com to a database named beer-db on the local server.

pre.code:
Status Code: 200 OK Accept-Ranges: bytes Date: Fri, 06 Dec 2013 21:57:08 GMT Server: CouchbaseLite 1.485 Transfer-Encoding: chunked
{ "session_id":"repl001", "ok":true }

doc.p: This request retrieves session information. Even though Couchbase Lite doesn't support user logins, it implements a generic response to the _session API for compatibility with apps, such as Futon, that might call it.
This request does not have any required headers.
This request does not use query parameters.
This request does not use a message body.
This response uses only standard HTTP headers.
The following example shows request for session information.
This request retrieves a list of the database identifiers.
This request does not have any required headers.
This request does not use query parameters.
This request does not use a message body.
This response uses only standard HTTP headers.
The response message body is a JSON document that contains the following objects.
The following example requests the UUIDs from the local server.

pre.code:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Server: CouchbaseLite 1.485 Content-Type: application/json Accept-Ranges: bytes Content-Length: 65 Cache-Control: must-revalidate Date: Mon, 09 Dec 2013 03:20:40 GMT
{ "uuids" : [ "E29107F0-DF5F-4273-86C4-4FF2ED0229AD" ] }
